OauthToken.name: OauthToken
OauthToken.description: Represents an OAuth access token for connected app authentication. Use this object to create a user interface for token management.

AppMenuItemId.description: The unique ID for the App Picker menu item that’s associated with this OAuth token.

AppName.description: The label for the connected app that’s associated with this OAuth token.

DeleteToken.description: A token that can be used at the revoke OAuth token endpoint to remove this token.

Id.description: Reserved for future use. Currently, the value is always null.

LastUsedDate.description: The most recent date when the OAuth token was used.

RequestToken.description: The authorization code that was used to request the corresponding AccessToken. With this authorization code, you can revoke the corresponding AccessToken by passing the DeleteToken.

UseCount.description: How often the token has been used.
